text: Henryk Charucki (born 2 December 1955) is a Polish former racing cyclist. He won the Tour de Pologne 1979. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:People from Ostrów Mazowiecka Category:Sportspeople from Masovian Voivodeship
title: Henryk Charucki
